Package net.chaossquad.mclib.misc

package net.chaossquad.mclib.misc
  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    net.chaossquad.mclib
     
  • Schnittstellen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    DynamicRemovableHolder
    This interface is an extended version of the RemovableHolder, which also allows setting the removable.
    It is normally implemented by a class which stores a removable.
    That removable can set after the object creation or change.
    ListenerRegistrar
    Provides a method to register a ManagedListener.
    Removable
    A class implementing this interface can "say" that it should be removed because it is no longer needed.
    RemovableHolder
    This interface provides a Removable.
    It is mainly used in lambda expressions to dynamically provide remove conditions from the outside of the class where it is stored.
